developerAddress:
1321 Upland Dr.
Suite # 2342
Houston TX 77043-4718
USA
recentChanges:
New ECN-2 templates
26 Templates included
Volume Mixer bug fixed
comments: Excellent app, used it for film processing, love the agitation reminders, dev time, stop time and fix times, haven't used it for printing, as I use Adobe photo really good app.

Love this app! It has made processing prints so much easier as I no longer have to count seconds. At first, I was worried that the red light mode would still fog my paper. But as long as I turn my phone's display lighting down, there is no problem. I just have to press the red light mode button for each print I process. And I like the metronome sound counting down the seconds as it keeps me alert. Thank you for this app!

Revolutionary! Been looking for something like this as it's sometimes tough to keep a hold of agitation times and in general organise the process. I've gone from writing down in a notebook the exact minute and second I need to start and stop agitating to just having the app telling me exactly what to do with the timer and countdown feature. Stress free development.

Overall excellent app in terms of customization, bit currently suffers from a few stability issues on my Galaxy S7. Two requests that I would ask to be implemented are the ability to set the app to default to safelight mode right off the bat at all times (it goes back to white light mode whenever I reset the timer which I find annoying) and the ability to time multiple prints since I generally would like to move onto another print while a previous print is final washing. As long as you work around those issues, it's really a great app and it's made my workflow in the darkroom much simpler.
Great app for film developing but for darkroom printing the safelight mode doesn't stay on when resetting the process to start a new print

title: Add Watermark
description:
Add watermarks to your pictures. Put your property text or a logo image into your picture, adjust its size, transparency, rotation, alignment, then save and share it. Lots of  settings and features, also auto processing and batch mode.


FOR SUPPORT AND HELP please contact me via email or website (see below)!

Primary features of the Full version:
• Batch mode for processing multiple images at once
• Auto processing through sharing images from other apps
• Fonts, color and other effects in text mode
• 72 built-in fonts, upto 20 custom fonts can be imported
• Built-in sticker collection
• Support of transparent .png images as watermark
• Quick sharing to Instagram, Facebook, Flickr etc.
• Easy selecting of recently used watermarks
• Adding of timestamp, filename, GPS tags and other properties as text watermark
• Full support of EXIF and XMP metadata
• Support of 360° panoramas
• Saving format .jpg or .png
• Rename and resize by saving

Limitations of the Free version:
• User defined image-watermarks are disabled
• Saving only as .jpg, downsized to 1024 px on the long side
• No auto mode while sharing images from other apps, no batch mode

Please notice following Android limitation: On Android 4.4 (KitKat) and above you can't anymore save images to any folder on the external SD card due to security restrictions. Use device's internal memory instead or the app's private folder on the external storage.

Useful tips:
• Don't delete original images after watermarking, because you can't remove watermarks from processed images.
• To add watermark automatically select photos in Gallery, then "Share" them to > "Add Watermark".
• To import custom fonts copy up to 20 TrueType or OpenType fonts to folder "addwatermark/custom_fonts" on your device.
• To place a date stamp on photo insert placeholder %date% in watermark text in "Settings".

Many thanks to: 
Ben (for Samia) for translation in Portuguese!

Feel free to contact me: androidvilla@gmail.com
Or visit my blog: http://androidvilla.wordpress.com
descriptionHTML:
Add watermarks to your pictures. Put your property text or a logo image into your picture, adjust its size, transparency, rotation, alignment, then save and share it. Lots of settings and features, also auto processing and batch mode.


FOR SUPPORT AND HELP please contact me via email or website (see below)!

Primary features of the Full version:
• Batch mode for processing multiple images at once
• Auto processing through sharing images from other apps
• Fonts, color and other effects in text mode
• 72 built-in fonts, upto 20 custom fonts can be imported
• Built-in sticker collection
• Support of transparent .png images as watermark
• Quick sharing to Instagram, Facebook, Flickr etc.
• Easy selecting of recently used watermarks
• Adding of timestamp, filename, GPS tags and other properties as text watermark
• Full support of EXIF and XMP metadata
• Support of 360° panoramas
• Saving format .jpg or .png
• Rename and resize by saving

Limitations of the Free version:
• User defined image-watermarks are disabled
• Saving only as .jpg, downsized to 1024 px on the long side
• No auto mode while sharing images from other apps, no batch mode

Please notice following Android limitation: On Android 4.4 (KitKat) and above you can't anymore save images to any folder on the external SD card due to security restrictions. Use device's internal memory instead or the app's private folder on the external storage.

Useful tips:
• Don't delete original images after watermarking, because you can't remove watermarks from processed images.
• To add watermark automatically select photos in Gallery, then "Share" them to > "Add Watermark".
• To import custom fonts copy up to 20 TrueType or OpenType fonts to folder "addwatermark/custom_fonts" on your device.
• To place a date stamp on photo insert placeholder %date% in watermark text in "Settings".

Many thanks to:
Ben (for Samia) for translation in Portuguese!
MarcyArtistic for translation in Dutch!
Renek for translation in Czech!
Muchamad Mahrus for translation in Indonesian!
TomoS for translation in Polish!
ene49 (CepTeam) for turkish translation

Tristan Lyonnet for translation in French!
Martin Lehmann Madsen for translation in Norwegian!
Magichannel for translation in Chinese!
Martin Sotelano for translation in Spanish!

Feel free to contact me: androidvilla@gmail.com
Or visit my blog: http://androidvilla.wordpress.com
summary: Add Watermark - Sign your pictures with a text or logo. Effective, quick, easy!
recentChanges:
- Increased maximal outgoing resulution (full version)
- Recall upto 20 recently used watermarks
- Adding many watermarks is now much easier
- Added support of 360-panoramas and Photospheres
- New: built-in sticker collection (Mail stamp, Merry Christmas, Happy New Year, Flowers, etc.)
- Added Portuguese translation. Many thanks to Ben (for Samia)!
- Fixed issue: rotated watermarks looks sometime ugly due to aliasing
- Fixed issue: invalid EXIF alignment marker without source EXIF data
comments: Used to be great, but on Android 11 now for some time, it doesn't let you add your images anymore ... RiP used to be good app ..

Great when first purchased as it worked perfectly. With s21 ultra it allows me to design and save my watermarked image but when you open the picture there is no watermark it's just a new copy of the unmarked image

Has stopped allowing me to upload images even though it has permission. Tells me there is an error and I need to check setting but there are none I can change. Worked for the longest time. Makes me sad it stopped
Easy to use and love that you can add your own logo!

I've had this app for years and the only one I used, I even paid so I could have more options. However now it will not add anymore pictures after the first one, I hit reopen and it still will not let me add the next photo.so disappointed. I have deleted and reinstalled several times and still does the same thing. I'm using a S9 never had problems with it before.. guess I will have to try some others and hope they get this app fixed. 😔😔😔😔😔

title: Camera Cards
description:
Handy photography cheat-cards from award-winning Australian Geographic photographer Chris Bray, summarising the key points of Composition, Exposure, Aperture, Shutter Speed, ISO, Lighting and Troubleshooting to lift your photos to the next level. This app is the instant, digital version of our popular physical camera-strap 'clip-cards’ treasured by photographers around the world. Enjoy!
 
Now you have all your info in one place:
1 - Our camera tip cards
2 - Our online tutorials
3 - Our photo tours

summary: Handy tips for better photos!
developerAddress: 79 Gaze Rd, Christmas Island, WA 6798, Australia
comments: This together with the tutorial video are excellent! I've been searching hundreds of videos until I've found this. Thank you so much for making what was complex for myself very easy to understand.

I bought this app as a contribution to the incredibly good free 2 hour and a half course on youtube. He covers all topics with wit & humour and demystifies some concepts along the way. Thank so much Chris.

The content of this app is so amazing. The tips and tutorials are so easily explained that I saw an enormous improvement after following these tips (and watching the videos on yt made by the same guy). The app itself could use some improvement: every time I quit it I receive a crash report and navigation is tricky since I wasn't able to find a way to "go back" to the previous page in the tutorials.

I LOVE THESE! I watched the free course with camera in hand and already I feel more confident. The courses cleared all the junk out if my head and put everything in order and perspective. I am a pretty serious amateur and offer my services FREE to anyone. But I still want to give as professional a portrait as possible and these cards and courses have put me many steps forward in my goals. Thank you Chris Bray and team!

Brought the app as contribution and appreciation for the 2hrs YouTube video, I recently brought canon 80d though knew basics but was looking for more details. Your video helped alot!!!! A suggestion can you add an option to upload our clicks for you and other professional to judge and comment so that we can improve. Thankyou so much ❤️

title: SkyFolio - OneDrive Photos, Uploads and Slideshows
description:
SkyFolio is the best offline photo gallery, uploader, and slideshow app for Microsoft OneDrive (formerly SkyDrive) and OneDrive for Business.  With its offline viewing, show photos even when you do not have an internet connection.  Upload pictures to OneDrive.  Select from a dozen slideshow animations and transitions to display beautiful slideshows.
 
📷 Take your photos offline
Syncs your online albums so you never need to wait on a network again.  Syncing occurs when you charge and are on WIFI.  Once synced, viewing pictures is very fast as they are downloaded to local storage.  Only display sizes are stored, so offline albums remain as small and fast as possible.
    
🖼 Slideshow
Use your device as a digital picture frame. Slideshows loop and can play videos too!  Choose from a dozen animations.  Play your slideshow on a single album or show all of your one drive pictures.  Turn on auto refresh so your slideshow stays current with latest slides.
  
✉️ Sharing
Sharing is easy.  Share photos with Gmail, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google Photos app, etc.  Easily share multiples and post pictures online.
 
📺 Television
Quickly Chrome cast one drive photos to a TV.  Run app on Android TV, like the nVidia Shield, Sony Bravia, Sharp AQUOS, or any Android TV box.
 
Low on storage?  Move app storage location to your sdcard.  
 
Use multiple accounts?  Login to multiple accounts and easily switch between them.
  
Features
· Auto downloads provide fast offline access to photos
· Batch uploader for OneDrive
· Sync only when you're on wifi
· High quality image for any display
· Animated photo and video slideshows
· Auto refresh slideshow slides
· Display slides for 1 second to 24 hours
· Play videos and animated GIFs
· Use Chrome cast to project photos onto your TV
· Move app data to sdcard
· Set as device screensaver
· Resize on upload to save storage space
· Share url
· Support for multiple login
· Sort by alpha, date taken, last modified, etc
· Pull to refresh
· Disable auto rotation in lightbox
· Crop to fill screen so pictures always fill the screen
· Force maximum brightness when viewing photos
· Read only mode turns off destructive actions like delete
· Change lightbox swipe transitions
   
I stand by and support my apps.  If you have a problem or would like a refund, email me at help@snapwoodapps.com.  Thanks for reading and enjoy the best OneDrive App for Android!

recentChanges:
1. New slideshow background and foreground settings. Select blur and color backgrounds and clock, weather, and photo information foregrounds. Select text size and style from 24 fonts.
2. Improved Ken Burns animation with face detection
3. Improved screensaver stability
comments: Excellent app, has all the features I have looked for in a photo app for OneDrive. Great slideshow options, with random shuffle and different transition options. OneDrive app itself has lacked good photo display features, but this app takes care of those needs. I don't usually purchase an app without being able to use it with a free trial, but the reviews were favorable and I took the chance. Glad I did! For just over four bucks (with tax), it is well worth the cost.

The first app that opens my Camera Roll folder with 5000+ photos and supports Google Chromecast. UI is not the prettiest but this feature is worth the the premium after Chromecast support was dropped out of the mobile apps for OneDrive in 2019. Shame Microsoft doesn't support it out of the box but kudos to the developer of this app. Gallery appears to be much faster than on the native app as well. 5* Note: As per 12/5/21 OneDrive native app has Chromecast support so make your own choice.
This is the best OneDrive photo gallery on playstore 👍🏻

If you are looking for a Google Photos alternative this is it. It has many targets, I used OneDrive. Load all photos into OneDrive, sync it with the app. Refreshes well. No hangs. I checked the firewall etc and there is no funny business. I use the PhotoSync mobile app and control all of the uploads separately into OneDrive and SkyFolio reads them like a charm. Here is a tip: If you want to edit a photo, you click on the export command back to your gallery. Nice! Thanks 👍👍👍👍👍

This App is just fantastic - especially now that it connects to OneDrive Business. We have in excess of 80,000 photos in about 100 folders and having the name of the folder added to the bottom of every Photo is fantastic. The features that come with this App - and the quick loading - make it by far the best (and cost effective) Photo and slideshow App by far on Google Play. Keep up the good work Brian - and thanks for the quick replies to help me through my fix. PS If you are twiddling your thumbs and want some more programming to do, A box and dark back ground around the folder title at the bottom of each photo would help with easier viewing of the title. :) :) Cheers and thanks again.

title: iWatermark+ Watermark Photos & Video With Logo etc
description:
Watermark to protect your photo and video (1080 & 4k). iWatermark+ the Essential Professional Watermark App. Batch Watermarking Using Visible & Invisible Watermarks
🚫 No Ads
🚫 No In App Purchases

Text, Logo, QR-Code, Signature on photo or video and more. Adding a watermark displays that it was created and is owned by you. Watermarking your Android (or Canon, Nikon, Sony, Olympus, Samsung) photos & videos is easy with a watermark or watermarks using your name, logo, copyright, trademark, QR code, signature, etc. Sign your photos with 5 visible and 2 invisible = 7 watermark types. Use one or multiple watermarks simultaneously on one or a batch of photos. Then share to Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Twitter, etc...

Why? Often when a photo or video goes viral the owner/creator becomes unknown, is lost or forgotten. Adding a watermark subtly displays, no matter where your photo goes, that it is owned by you. Watermark with your logo, email, website url, signature, QR or other info to maintain a connection to your photos.

iWatermark+, is the only watermarking tool available for all 4 platforms Android, iOS, Mac and Windows. iWatermark+ is the most popular and advanced utility for creating watermarks and watermarking photos

Only iWatermark+ has 7 Watermark Types-
5 Visible Watermarks:
- Text - and change the font, color, angle, opacity, etc
- Arc Text
- Bitmap Graphics - import your logo or use our library
- Signature Scan - creates a watermark of your signature
- QRCode - creates a watermark that is like a barcode, readable by any smartphone camera and can contain up to 4000 characters of info

2 Invisible Watermarks:
- Metadata - for making watermarks that include IPTC/EXIF tags (like camera info, GPS, copyright, etc.) info
- Steganographic - for hiding a watermark in the color data of a photo

Only iWatermark+ has these features:
* watermark photos/videos (1080 & 4k)
* creates 7 watermark types, text, text on an arc, bitmap, signature, QR, metadata, and steganographic
* steganographic watermark that embeds info invisibly in the photo
* keeps a database of all your watermarks
* apply multiple watermarks to one photo
* watermark one or multiple photos in batch mode
* 292 excellent fonts for your text watermarks
* engrave and emboss text
* signature scanner to instantly import your signature or graphic as a watermark
* live preview and editing of font, color, scale, opacity, size, position and angle
* view metadata & exif in photos
* create metadata tags in text watermarks
* share to Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, Instagram, etc.

Watermarking displays your ownership of a photo. Like signing your name to a document, watermarking subtly displays, no matter where your photo goes, that it’s your property. 

Touch is what iWatermark+ on Android is all about:
♦ With your finger drag the watermark to any position on the page
♦ Create your own text or graphic watermarks or select from the included example watermarks (both text and graphics)
♦ Single or batch process many photos at a time
♦ Choose from the many fonts
♦ By touch easily adjust the watermarks scale, opacity, font, color and angle and more

Why Watermark? 

Digitally sign your photos/artwork with iWatermark+ to claim, secure and maintain your intellectual property and reputation. 

✔ Photos go viral then they fly off globally. Watermark with name, email or url so your photo has a visible and legal connection to you
✔ Build your company brand, by having your company watermark on all it's photos
✔ Promote your company, name and website by using QR codes as watermarks
✔ Avoid the surprise of seeing your photos and/or artwork elsewhere on the web or in an ad
✔ Avoid the conflicts, costly litigation and headaches from plagiarists who claim they didn't know that you created it
✔ Avoid intellectual property (IP) squabbles

Perfect for use with Canon Inc., Nikon Inc., Olympus Inc., Sony Inc., Samsung, SLR, regular cameras & all Android smartphones/tablets.

Contact us for help

comments: The best app for branding. Your logo is saved in the same position and size as your last edit. Simply add your new photo and save. Super easy and user-friendly.

I have the iWatermark+ for Android, the paid version. I know how to use this app and have marked my photos with no problem up until about a month ago. Now it simply does not work. No watermark appears. I've contacted Support a couple of times & got a snotty response the 2nd time. (The 1st time, I inadvertently hit the wrong button when identifying which version I have. I will happily rate it 5 stars if you can get it to work again.
Works great! Choose your own watermark design, colors. Great tool to use so you know its your work!

I need to lighten up on the Plum Amazing team a bit. They've been in regular contact with beta fixes, but thiscapp simply doesn't work for the Note 9 and other platforms at latest Android releases. The app appears to be using some code that either Android no longer supports or that Android developers know has been broken for some time. It may be up to Plum Amazing to redesign the app using different calls in order to become upward-compatible. For now...the app simply isn't usable.

I have been using this app since the last couple of years and it's fabulous. But since the last one week I can't load any images through the app. I have noticed this problem has started after I got an android 10 update on my pixel 2xl. Could you'll please look into this and have it resolved at the earliest. Thanks in advance.

title: PicFrame
description:
PicFrame helps you combine multiple photos into amazing looking frames and share them with your friends and family. With 36 fully adjustable frames, rounded corners, adjustable photo effects, shapes, adjustable border width, background patterns and an easy border color picker you will always have a unique look.
 
Features:
 - 36 fully adjustable frames with up to 5 photos (drag the inner frame borders for endless customisation!).
 - Rounded corners
 - Adjustable border width
 - Change the shape of your photos to a circle, heart, hexagon and more
 - Change the color of the border with an easy to use color picker
 - 52 patterns for the frames background
 - Adjust the brightness, contrast and saturation of each photo
 - Rotate photos
 - Select one of six ratios including square format (1:1, 3:2, 4:3, 16:9, 9:16, 2:3, 3:4)
 - Pinch to zoom and drag to move the photos
 - Save to your gallery
 - Share to other applications (Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Email)
 - Multiple output resolutions

Check PicFrame out on Twitter: http://twitter.com/PicFrameApp and Facebook: http://facebook.com/PicFrameApp

recentChanges: Added the ability to select multiple photos
comments: Last updated in 2019. I've had it for about that long. The app crashes when changing aspect ratio. If one decides a pic looks better in another position, one has to delete and choose again, instead of just dragging and dropping. No menu for options or even a tutorial at this stage is a loss, because otherwise the program works fine. May have to change this app for another, but this version doesn't have ads.

This app does exactly what I need without being so complicated that I can't understand. All I wanted was to be able to take two pictures and make them into one. I didn't think to look at collage apps. The only thing I haven't figured out is how to save the new one I made. Thanks for making an app that even a senior citizen can figure it out (mostly. - just tell me how to save)
I am disappointed that I bought the app for android. There are way fewer options than on iOS. It also crashes a lot and that causes me to start over.

Edit - after the 8/1/19 update I still cannot take pics within the app. I have used this app for 2.5 years and it always worked well. However they did an update and I can no longer save pictures I take in app. It will let me take a picture but as soon as I hit "ok" it takes be back to the homescreen. I've deleted and reinstalled the app twice and the issue persists. This makes this app worthless to me as that is 95% of what I do and I can do the other 5% on a different app. Please fix.

Pros-variety of backgrounds, ability to widen/narrow borders and rounded corners Cons-frequently closes and work is lost (multiple times within a few minutes). I do multiple images & sizes in collages, choices of collage collection options are limited, often have to rework images to fit. Each time you change the aspect your work is gone & have to start over. Be prepared to spend a bit of time using this app.

title: Bordin
description:
Avoid Instagram from cropping your image. Choose a frame from available colors and freely position and resize an image within the frame.
For support or feature request please contact bordin@byteset.com
descriptionHTML:
Avoid Instagram from cropping your image. Choose a frame from available colors and freely position and resize an image within the frame.

summary: Add a square frame and position/resize an image within. Ideal for Instagram.
recentChanges: First release.

title: Graphie - EXIF editor
description:
Graphie is a tool for advanced management of your images, including changing metadata, extracting colors, finding shoot location and much more!

Management of EXIF
Graphie allows you to easily change the most popular EXIF tags of any images manually (entering data for changes each time) or using pre-collected parameters. Easily clear all tags with the click of a button.

Even more options
For all designers and ordinary users, the ability to extract colors and search for the location on which the shooting took place is also available. Extract vibrant (dark and light) and muted (dark and light) colors with easy.

Detailed statistics
Collect detailed statistics about all your images, which include filtering by ISO, Aperture, Color space and much more. After that, you can search and view images by many criteria.

FAQ and localization
Looking for answers to frequently asked questions (FAQ)? Visit this page: https://pavelrekun.dev/graphie/faq/

Want to help in Graphie localization? Visit this page:
https://crowdin.com/project/graphie

comments: App cant access SD card images and they dont have a refund policy even though i immediately realized it and tried to refund

Great App to edit the EXIF data when you want it. I didn't see an automated batch wipe function. I suggest that so I can delete an app. Most times if you share a pic on the internet, you don't want the EXIF data on the picture.
